entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reenable Publish_HostedApp_WithRidSpecifiedAsArgument_NoSelfContained_Works #44210
  • .NET 9.0 SDK is shipping unpatched copies of System.Text.Json #44197
    9.0.1xx
  • Enable NuGet Audit in sdk #44193
  • [WebToolsE2E] Install .NET SDK 9.0 RC2 +.NET SDK 9.0 RTM, the templates version is not replaced by higher versions. #44180
  • Publish_HostedApp_WithRidSpecifiedAsArgument_NoSelfContained_Works test fails #44179
    9.0.2xx
  • APICompat should compare relevant assembly-level attributes #44172

Closed

  • Customer using userlocal maui install unable to find maui workloads #44165

PullRequests

Created

  • stabilize branding for release #44211
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add a -sign switch and enable signing for some legs #44207
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve error message for missing artifact files #44206
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #44203
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Workloads: Support VS component IDs #44198
    Servicing-consider
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44195
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44178
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Fix "NETSDK1214" referring to existing diagnostic #44175
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2561325 #43920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • msbuild patch to remove BuildXL feed #44199
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove a extra item line #44084
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • use SpecialFolder.UserProfile in few places #43826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update Windows SDK projection versions #43889
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Create 0001-remove-buildxl-feed.patch #44194
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix SB assembly version test #44192
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Linux: Installing/Updating packages with uppercase versions #43988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WASM and agent refactoring #43975
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools, 9.0.2xx
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Add xunit configuration to increase test logging #41963
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Watch
  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fine tune first join point and VMR support for it #44153
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #34508] WIP: Implement --no-cache option for tool install locally #36369
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #43607
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-VMR
  • fix port error when fallback to http #44050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Enable previously disabled tests #43073
    Area-WasmSdk, 10.0.1xx
  • Expand osx-arm64 test coverage #44008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
